services.q: What kinds of organizations do you work with?
services.a: We work with small and medium-sized companies in industries such as hospitality, manufacturing, and transportation â€” particularly those undergoing growth, restructuring, or modernization. Most clients reach out when their operations or culture are no longer aligned with their goals.

services.q: How long does a typical engagement last?
services.a: Projects usually run between 3 and 16 weeks, depending on the scope. You'll find more detail in the Services section, and a clear timeline is always established during the discovery phase.
All work is billed hourly, with estimated ranges displayed in the Services section. A detailed project estimate is agreed upon before we begin â€” no hidden fees or open-ended billing.

locations.q: Can we start with a smaller project?
locations.a: Yes â€” many companies begin with an initial assessment or strategy phase to clarify priorities before moving into full implementation.

locations.q: Do you work remotely or on-site?
locations.a: Most work is done remotely, but we also conduct on-site workshops and leadership sessions when in-person collaboration adds value.

process.q: What's the first step if we want to work together?
process.a: Start with a short discovery call â€” a no-pressure conversation about your goals, challenges, and priorities. From there, we'll outline next steps, including a project scope, estimated timeline, and pricing.
You can expect clearer priorities, smoother operations, stronger team alignment, and measurable progress in how your company works and communicates.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: Vadatei ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.
privacy.personalInfoText: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
privacy.personalInfoContact: Contact us through our website or email
privacy.personalInfoDiscovery: Schedule a discovery call or consultation
privacy.personalInfoIncludes: This information may include your name, email address, phone number, company name, job title, and any other information you choose to provide.
privacy.autoInfoText: We may automatically collect certain information about your device and usage patterns, including:
privacy.autoInfoPages: Pages visited and time spent on our website
privacy.useInfoText: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.useInfoProvide: Provide and improve our consulting services
privacy.useInfoRespond: Respond to your inquiries and requests
privacy.useInfoSchedule: Schedule and conduct discovery calls and consultations
privacy.useInfoSend: Send you relevant information about our services
privacy.useInfoAnalyze: Analyze website usage and improve user experience
privacy.sharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except:
privacy.sharingProviders: To trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business
privacy.sharingLaw: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.sharingTransfer: In connection with a business transfer or merger
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.rightsDelete: Request deletion of your personal information
privacy.rightsCopy: Request a copy of your personal information
